name.baseName: Grain ; Kerosene ; Drying ; All sizes; NESPS2
粮食 ; 煤油 ; 烘干 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisS12 Others (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisS12 Others (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程涉及使用煤油对谷物进行烘干，适用于所有规模的生产。在这种情况下，该过程需要应用多种尾气污染管理技术。这些技术被用来处理废气、烟尘、二氧化硫(SO2)，以及潜在的氮氧化物(NOx)，尽管后者目前没有管理，表现为其管理效率为0％。所列技术包括文丘里洗涤器、布袋过滤器、喷雾塔/水冲击浴、离心水膜作为烟尘管理，以及几种二氧化硫处理方法，如旋转喷雾干燥、氨法、烟气循环流化床、钠碱（S12其他）、氧化镁、石灰石/石膏和双碱法。每项技术都有其相应的去除污染物的效率，布袋过滤器在烟尘管理中以99.6%的最高效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码05,四级代码0514文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Flue dustisBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.6
污染物指标烟尘的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为99.6，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设施年运行小时数/热风炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为烟尘，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为烟尘
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Flue dustisCentrifugal water film，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87
污染物指标烟尘的末端治理技术是离心水膜，其效率为87，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设施年运行小时数/热风炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为烟尘，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为烟尘

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator is sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library to match the most compatible flow, the pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide original description of the production coefficient of 19 S. Please modify the corresponding emissions after self-calculation according to the note.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫原文描述的产污系数为 19S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
